citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:57am on March,
14 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door of the house and the barn as well as
calling the licensee and a facility representative. Voicemails were left on both phone numbers on the account and text
messages indicating the need for a focused inspection were sent. The licensee contact the lead inspector are 12:05 PM
and informed them that no one could be available for an inspection within the hour. Failure to provide access to the
facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result
in enforcement action.
Additional Inspectors:
Bryan Voetberg, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:57am on March, 
14 2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door of the house and the barn as well as 
calling the licensee and a facility representative. Voicemails were left on both phone numbers on the account and text 
messages indicating the need for a focused inspection were sent. The licensee contact the lead inspector are 12:05 PM 
and informed them that no one could be available for an inspection within the hour. Failure to provide access to the 
facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure to comply may result 
in enforcement action. 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
Bryan Voetberg, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
